text: Ray Fisher (born September 8, 1987) is an American movie, television and stage actor. He is best known for his roles in the comedy The Good, the Bad and the Confused. Ray played Muhammad Ali in Will Power's Fetch Clay Make Man in 2013. He is mainly known for playing Victor Stone / Cyborg in the DC Extended Universe such as in Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice and in the upcoming Justice League. Sometime in 2020, Fisher will be in a Cyborg movie. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Baltimore Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:Twitch (service) streamers
title: Ray Fisher (actor)
